text: Who do you think this person is? What do you think they are advertising? Who is the audience?
subText: Exactly. This person appears to be a sportsplayer. He is promoting shoes. He is likely to be reaching out to sports players who aspire to be like him.

text: How about this image? What are they advertising? Who are they reaching out to?
subText: Exactly. They are reaching out to families who would like to buy shoes.
